testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: When guest user clicks on Register Tab......................................passed Then guest user should be directed to registering page......................passed When guest user chooses any Gender option...................................passed And Fill First Name.........................................................passed And Fill Last Name..........................................................passed And Select Day..............................................................passed And Select Month............................................................passed And Select Year.............................................................passed And Enter any email.........................................................passed And Enter any company name..................................................passed And Enter any password......................................................passed And Enter same password in Confirm Password field...........................passed And Click on REGISTER button................................................passed Then the user should be registered successfully.............................passed And a success green message is displayed....................................passed
